meanings.sent1: She composes beautiful melodies on her piano.
meanings.sent2: The musician composes a new song every week.
meanings.sent3: The composer composes music that makes people dance.
meanings.sent4: Her mind composes symphonies even in her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The artist composes music that touches the soul.

meanings.sent1: He composes a puzzle with great patience.
meanings.sent2: The chef composes a delicious dish with fresh ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The team composes a plan to win the game.
meanings.sent4: The artist composes a masterpiece from various colors.
meanings.sent5: The writer composes a story that captivates the reader.

meanings.sent1: Each color composes the beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The different elements composes the whole picture.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients composes the perfect recipe for a cake.
meanings.sent4: Every note composes the enchanting melody.
meanings.sent5: Every word composes the meaningful poem.
